SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnalyzedFloatEvent
Represents a Mya history event for a PV of data type float, and includes extra analysis statistics.
BoundaryAwareStream<T>
A BoundaryAwareStream will attempt to provide an event (point) exactly on the beginning and end of an interval.
DataNexus
Manages the possibly multiple data sources required to service requests to a cluster of Mya hosts, which make up a deployment.
DataNexus.IntervalQueryFetchStrategy
The fetch strategy for obtaining records from the database.
Event
A Mya history event such as an update or discontinuity marker.
EventCode
Mya event codes.
EventStream<T>
Provides an I/O Channel for streaming Mya events.
ExtraInfo
Provides additional information about an EPICS PV, which unlike standard Metadata, is versioned (may change over time).
FloatAnalysisStream
Wraps an EventStream of FloatEvents and provides AnalyzedFloatEvents.
FloatEvent
Represents a Mya history event for a PV of data type float.
FloatGraphicalSampleStream<T>
Wraps an EventStream and provides FloatEvents that are down-sampled as they stream by using an algorithm which attempts to maintain graphical fidelity of the data.
FloatSimpleSampleStream<T>
Wraps an EventStream and provides FloatEvents that are down-sampled as they stream by using a simple algorithm.
IntEvent
Represents a Mya history event for a PV of data type int.
LabeledEnumEvent
Represents a Mya history event for a PV of data type enum, which has been assigned a label.
LabeledEnumStream
Wraps an IntEventStream and provides LabelEnumEvents by assigning enumeration labels to integer values.
ListStream<T>
An EventStream backed by an in-memory list.
Metadata<T>
The metadata associated with an EPICS PV.
MultiStringEvent
Represents a Mya history event for a PV that is vector in nature (regardless of data type) or a PV that is not a scalar int or float.
MyaDataType
Mya DataTypes.
MySamplerStream<T>
This is a class mimics the command line mySampler application.
MySamplerStream.Strategy
The different sampling strategies that can be used.
OnDemandNexus
A Mya DataNexus which creates resources on-demand and closes them immediately after use.
PooledNexus
A Mya DataNexus which pools resources for later use.
RunningStatistics
This class provides summary statistics about the specified set of MYA data.
TimeUtil
Utility methods for time including conversion between Mya's database time format and Java's native Instant.
WrappedStream<T,E>
An EventStream that wraps another EventStream.
